Excellent, had trouble finding this film - thanks!

Would any of you remember a flick in which an indifferent swordsman gets his whole arm cut off, trains himself to exceptional skill and starts to exact revenge. Can't remember the name or the actors, only other thing I remember was that his ancestral blade was also broken and had rings on the off side.

Thanks.
You've no idea how long I've been looking for it.
love this movie.. thanks!
